english: They lit a fire to keep wild animals off .
chinese: 他们燃起篝火防止野兽接近。

english: A safety strap is used to prevent falling .
chinese: 要系上安全带防止跌下。

english: Smoke has no value in preventing heat-loss .
chinese: 烟对于防止热量散失没有作用。

english: They also impede backmixing of sand .
chinese: 同时也可防止砂子的返混。

english: I think i have a cure for it .
chinese: 对此我想出了一种防止的方法。
防止造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Every effort should be made to guard against them .
chinese: 必须尽一切努力防止其发生。

english: Cadres should guard against sectarian tendencies .
chinese: 干部应该防止宗派主义的倾向。

english: That will prevent the wings of the aircraft from icing up .

chinese: 这样可以防止肠道穿孔。

english: This prevents urine from running back under the cast .
chinese: 这可防止管型下的尿液倒流。

english: This is the way to keep off every calamity of life .
chinese: 这是防止住生命中灾难的办法。

english: The authorities took measures to prevent tax fraud .
chinese: 当局已采取措施防止偷税漏税。

english: It prevents the bankrupt disposing of his estate .
chinese: 它要防止破产人处理自己的财产。

english: Hard work is the best antidote to mischief .
chinese: 繁忙的工作是防止为非作歹的最好方法。

english: We hindered and repressed a great deal of cruelty .
chinese: 我们防止和制止了许多暴力事件。
